segments.text: I'm just watching this quiet kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The daytime light streams in from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing there, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems entirely absorbed in her task, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can see the faucet is fully on, and the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a rather large puddle on the floor at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already submerged in the water, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is quite astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll feel the wetness soon enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit worrying to see all that water just pooling there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is really striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
